content: Yes, I am aware of the Everytime application in Korea. Everytime is a mobile application that is popular among Korean students, particularly those in high school and college. It is designed to help students communicate with each other about academics, such as sharing notes, asking for help with homework, and discussing class schedules. It is also used to share information about campus life, such as events and clubs. The app has gained popularity for its anonymous posting feature, which allows users to post questions or comments without revealing their identity.
